multiple="false" uniqueid="sk--O2-910"><contents><p>The below sections provide the lists of companies linked to the Customer by:</p>

<p>- <strong>Aggregation</strong>: CompaNies not in a group structure but have been linked by Simply due to shared owners etc.</p>

<p>- <strong>Hierarchy</strong>: The group structure of the company</p>

<p>Linked exposure will include the exposure figures shown above. Some companies may be shown as both as an Aggregated Company and a Group Company but will not be included in both.&nbsp;</p>
